chapter.title: Add team members to your program
chapter.p: To add team members to your program from the Programs page, click on the admin carrot and select “Team."
This will take you to the “Team” page within your program.

By clicking on the blue “(+) Add team member” icon, you can view a list of all the Mingle users who can be added to your plan. Once added, team members can collaborate on your program, modifying work and objectives to adapt your program as it progresses.

To remove team members, check the box next to the appropriate name(s). This will enable the remove button, which by clicking, will remove the member from your program. (N.B. This action will not delete users from your Mingle instance. It will only remove them from your program.)

note.p: To add or remove team members from within your program, simply click on the “Team” navigation pill in the orange Mingle header.
